fn.p: Competing Interests: ABA received funding from two commercial sources: LÓreal Portugal, through the research award L'Oréal Portugal Medals of Honor for Women in Science (2012) and Gilead Génese HIVLatePresenters. This does not alter our adherence to PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
¶ Membership of the Portuguese HIV-1 Resistance Study Group is provided in the Acknowledgments.
